content: lace crown sizes baby toddler child adult finished measurements 14 16 18 20 needles us size 7 4 5mm 16 circular needle and dpns or size needed to obtain gauge yarn 1 skein malabrigo rios 210yds/100g in color cucumber gauge 5 sts = 1 in stockinette stitch abbreviations instructions cast on 70 80 90 100 join in the round being careful not to twist your stitches place a marker to indicate the beginning/end of your round round 1 *k1 p1* repeat to end of round repeat round 1 4 4 5 5 more times round 1 and every odd numbered round *k9 p1* repeat to end of round round 2 *k1 yo ssk yo s1 k2tog psso yo k2tog yo k1 p1* repeat to end of round round 4 *k2 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k2 p1* repeat to end of round round 6 *k3 yo s1 k2tog psso yo k3 p1* repeat to end of round round 8 *k4 yo ssk k3 p1* repeat to end of round repeat round 1 until hat measures 4 5 5 6 7 from beginning crown shaping round 1 ssk k5 k2tog p1 rounds 2 and 3 k7 p1 round 4 ssk k3 k2tog p1 round 5 k5 p1 round 6 ssk k1 k2tog p1 round 7 k3 p1 round 8 s1 k2tog psso p1 round 9 k 2022 arianna soloway designs page 1 of 1
